mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) registerUserNum,#{startDate} startDate,#{endDate} endDate,#{userSource} userSource FROM CHINALIFEEC.GE_USER_PERSONAL WHERE USERSOURCE = #{userSource} AND
makedate >= TO_DATE(concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and makedate <= TO_DATE(concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT min(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')) statDay, CASE WHEN INDEX_SOURCE IN ('国寿i动','国寿i车','国寿i购','国寿通') THEN '创新' WHEN INDEX_SOURCE IN ('掌上国寿','官方网站','官网养老','手机M站','官方微信','国寿一账通') THEN '网销' ELSE '未知渠道' END indexSource, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) dayNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) lastDayNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME >= CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM'),'-01')
and STAT_TIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) monthNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME >= CONCAT(to_char(add_months(trunc(sysdate-1),-1),'yyyy-mm'),'-01')
and STAT_TIME <= CONCAT(to_char(add_months(trunc(sysdate-1),-1),'yyyy-mm'),'-31')
THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) lastMonthNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME >= CONCAT(to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy'),'-01-01')
and STAT_TIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) yearNum, min(CASE WHEN INDEX_SOURCE IN ('国寿i动','国寿i车','国寿i购','国寿通') THEN 1000000 WHEN INDEX_SOURCE IN ('掌上国寿','官方网站','官网养老','手机M站','官方微信','国寿一账通') THEN 1530000 ELSE 0 END) yearGoal FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE INDEX_NAME = 'registerNum' AND STAT_TIME_SPAN = 'D' AND INDEX_SOURCE IN ('国寿i动','国寿i车','国寿i购','掌上国寿','官方网站','官网养老','手机M站','官方微信','国寿一账通','国寿通') GROUP BY CASE WHEN INDEX_SOURCE IN ('国寿i动','国寿i车','国寿i购','国寿通') THEN '创新' WHEN INDEX_SOURCE IN ('掌上国寿','官方网站','官网养老','手机M站','官方微信','国寿一账通') THEN '网销' ELSE '未知渠道' END UNION ALL select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') statDay,'总计' indexSource, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) dayNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2,'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) lastDayNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME >= CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM'),'-01')
and STAT_TIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) monthNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME >= CONCAT(to_char(add_months(trunc(sysdate-1),-1),'yyyy-mm'),'-01')
and STAT_TIME <= CONCAT(to_char(add_months(trunc(sysdate-1),-1),'yyyy-mm'),'-31')
THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) lastMonthNum, SUM (CASE WHEN STAT_TIME >= CONCAT(to_char(sysdate-1,'yyyy'),'-01-01')
and STAT_TIME <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
THEN INDEX_VALUE ELSE 0 END ) yearNum, 1000000+1530000 yearGoal FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE INDEX_NAME = 'registerNum' AND STAT_TIME_SPAN = 'D' AND INDEX_SOURCE IN ('国寿i动','国寿i车','国寿i购','掌上国寿','官方网站','官网养老','手机M站','官方微信','国寿一账通','国寿通')

SELECT USERSOURCE userSource,TO_CHAR (makedate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') registerDate,count(*) registerUserNum FROM CHINALIFEEC.GE_USER_PERSONAL WHERE ${whereCondition}
makedate >= TO_DATE(concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and makedate <= TO_DATE(concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY USERSOURCE,TO_CHAR (makedate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
